changeSet.sql: update ap_item set delete_change_id = create_change_id where item_id in ( select ai.item_id from ap_item ai join arr_data d on d.data_id = ai.data_id join rul_data_type rdt on rdt.data_type_id = d.data_type_id join rul_item_type rit on ai.item_type_id = rit.item_type_id where rdt.code = 'ENUM' and ai.item_spec_id is null and ai.delete_change_id is null)

changeSet.author: ppyt
changeSet.sql: update ap_item i set part_id = si.target_part_id from ( select min(p.part_id) target_part_id, ai.item_id from ap_part p join rul_part_type rpt on rpt.part_type_id = p.part_type_id join ap_part p2 on p.access_point_id = p2.access_point_id and p.part_type_id = p2.part_type_id and p2.delete_change_id is null and p.part_id < p2.part_id join ap_item ai on ai.part_id = p2.part_id where rpt.code in ('PT_BODY') and p.delete_change_id is null group by ai.item_id ) si where si.item_id = i.item_id

delete from ap_index where part_id in (select p2.part_id from ap_part p join rul_part_type rpt on rpt.part_type_id = p.part_type_id join ap_part p2 on p.access_point_id = p2.access_point_id and p.part_type_id = p2.part_type_id and p2.delete_change_id is null and p.part_id < p2.part_id where rpt.code in ('PT_BODY') and p.delete_change_id is null group by p2.part_id )

delete from ap_key_value where key_value_id in (select p2.part_id from ap_part p join rul_part_type rpt on rpt.part_type_id = p.part_type_id join ap_part p2 on p.access_point_id = p2.access_point_id and p.part_type_id = p2.part_type_id and p2.delete_change_id is null and p.part_id < p2.part_id where rpt.code in ('PT_BODY') and p.delete_change_id is null group by p2.part_id )

update ap_part p set delete_change_id = create_change_id from ( select p2.part_id from ap_part p join rul_part_type rpt on rpt.part_type_id = p.part_type_id join ap_part p2 on p.access_point_id = p2.access_point_id and p.part_type_id = p2.part_type_id and p2.delete_change_id is null and p.part_id < p2.part_id where rpt.code in ('PT_BODY') and p.delete_change_id is null group by p2.part_id) si where p.part_id = si.part_id
